en.pageDesc: List of all features offered by Mockoon, the REST API mocking tool compatible with Windows, Mac and Linux.
en.featureDesc1: Mock an unlimited number of environments with unlimited number of routes and run them in parallel.
en.featureDesc2: Environment import / export either from or to a file or the clipboard. Learn more
en.featureDesc3: Route regex supported (/.*, /[a-z]{3}, ...), based on ExpressJS syntax.
en.featureDesc4: Support all HTTP status codes and methods: GET 200, POST 502, etc.
en.featureDesc5: Automatically send CORS headers (Access-Control-Allow-Origin, etc.) for OPTIONS requests. Learn more
en.featureDesc6: Serve your mock API over TLS with self-signed certificate. Learn more
en.featureDesc7: Add any custom headers to your routes. With auto-completion.
en.featureDesc8: Add latency at environment or route level or even both.
en.featureDesc9: All entering requests are logged for easier debugging. Learn more
en.featureDesc10: Redirect all non-defined routes to the specified host with Mockoon's proxy mode.
en.featureDesc11: File serving with automatic mime type detection.
en.featureDesc12: Rich text editor for body content supporting multiple languages (JSON, HTML, etc).
en.featureDesc13: JSON templating supports many helpers which can also react to request parameters: url params, query params, JSON body lookup, etc. Learn more
en.featureDesc14: Real-time auto save as you type. Never worry again about saving!
en.featureDesc15: No account, no sign-up, no cloud deployment required.
